refnamediv.refpurpose: Prints a new value every time a control variable changes.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Prints a new value every time a control variable changes.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: inumspaces (optional, default=0) -- number of space characters printed before the value of kvar

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Derived from Robin Whittle's printk, prints a new value of kvar each time kvar changes. Useful for monitoring MIDI control changes when using sliders.

warning.para: WARNING! Don't use this opcode with normal, continuously variant k-signals, because it can hang the computer, as the rate of printing is too fast.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
